name: Realism Engine
description:
Realism Engine 1.0

The new era of photorealism

Formerly develop under code name _optimal. This new model was fine-tuned using a vast collection of public domain images, ensuring that it can generate images across a wide range of contexts. While it may not be as strong in generating abstract or highly stylized images, it excels in generating images that are true to life, visually compelling and that accurately reflect the input textual description.

We strongly recommend employing nfixer or nrealfixer when crafting objects or landscapes; however, we advise against using it for portraits, as it has a tendency to produce similar and unhealthily thin models.

meta.prompt: closeup portrait of a young sexy Ukrainian woman with revealing Fit and flare dress in Spa retreat , symmetrical face,  Outdoor lighting, Brooding atmosphere, sharp eyes
meta.negativePrompt: 3d render, cgi, painting, drawing, cartoon, anime, skinny, oversaturated, high contrast
meta.Wildcard prompt: "closeup portrait of a young sexy Ukrainian woman with revealing __dress__ in Spa retreat , symmetrical face,  Outdoor lighting, __atmosphere__, sharp eyes"
